data.name: This Thing of Ours
data.detailed_description:
Welcome to New Temperance, known as the last frontier for the Italian-American mafia. The two controlling La Cosa Nostra families are locked in a peaceful rivalry for the city's rackets. You play as a young hood named Vinny that's in a neighborhood-based crew known as The Beacon Hill Crew that was formed in his childhood years. With the guidance of your uncle, you learn how to make the right and wrong decisions in the underbelly of the city's underworld fraternity.

How to Make That Extra “scharole”


There are a number of ways to make a living in the city of New Temperance when a 9 to 5 doesn’t quite cut your lifestyle.

  • Smash and Grab
  • Truck Hijacking
  • Chop Shops
  • Drug Dealing
  • Stickups
  • Home Invasions

Features Worth Taking A Pinch For…


  • Character customization - As they say look the part, be the part. Customized Vinny with a new look whatever the occasion.
  • In-depth and realistic story-driven scenarios - Get a real feel of what it’s like to be an up-and-coming criminal within an organized crime family. Every mission has been created to give you a unique experience and take away that repetitive feeling.
  • Empire panel - Control and view information about your ever-growing empire through the Empire panel.
  • Money laundering - The game features a system where you will also require “clean money” to purchase legitimate assets. In order to do this, you will have to gain contacts that will turn that dirty money into clean money.

Where to meet your “goomba” and where to take your “goomah”


  • The city is made up of 8 different areas that all offer a unique experience, just don’t go into some of the neighborhoods after 9 PM as you might lose your kidney and your wallet.
  • Ferrers Green - Also known as Little Italy is the most historically riddled neighborhood of them all. If you're a tourist we recommend you grab a bite to eat at Carmines Corner or Old Papas clay house.
  • Harrowfield - This is an iconic situated area with cafes, nightclubs, and enough stores to shop until you drop!
  • Terminal Island - This is one of the busiest areas of the city. It hosts a large terminal dock that can harbor up to 4 container ships at a single given time. It’s also home to a Crafty beer brewery.
  • Becken Garden - Also known as China town or by the locals as Wok City. You will find some of the best cuisines and bathhouses Asia has to offer.
  • Fordham - Irish - American neighborhood which traces back to the 1800s. You want a pint of the finest ale Fordham is the place to be.
  • Whiteway beach - Literally stuck between the old and the new. In one direction you have a thriving casino in the other direction you have a once-prominent beachfront that now hosts
  • Flaxley - If you plan to drive through, lock your doors. If you plan to walk through there, don’t. One of the roughest drug-riddled neighborhoods in the city where the police refuse to patrol due to the sociable residents.
  • City limits - The picturesque scenery really does put the area into perspective filled with beautiful mountains and farmland, it really does create the perfect spot to hide a body.

Gameplay Features


  • Fully functioning AI for NPC’s.
  • Vehicle and pedestrian traffic
  • L train/subway system
  • A big selection of weapons
  • 24-hour day/night cycle.
  • Weather changes
  • Police AI system

What's to come after early access


  • Customizable houses and HQ.
  • Additional mapping
  • Fully working Empire Panel where you will be able to control aspects of your faction, business, finances and bribes.
  • Animals around the map
  • AI upgrade
  • Boats
  • Carwashes.
  • More vehicles.
  • More vehicle customization options.
  • Much more to follow!

data.short_description: Welcome to New Temperance, known as the last frontier for the Italian-American mafia. The two controlling La Cosa Nostra families are locked in a peaceful rivalry for the city's rackets. You play as a young hood named Vinny that's in a neighborhood-based crew known as The Beacon Hill Crew.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2550K
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 3 GB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains Nudity; Strong Language; Strong Sexual Content; Use of Drugs and Alcohol. This thing of ours may feature racist remarks in order to fit a realistic narrative in conjunction with the time period it is set in.
